metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10255 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The __libelf_set_rawdata_wrlock function in elf_getdata.c in elfutilsbefore 0.168 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash)via a crafted (1) sh_off or (2) sh_size ELF header value, which triggers amemory allocation failure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.165-3ubuntu1.1
libasm1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.1
libdw1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.1
libelf1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: elfutils package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.165-3ubuntu1.1').
